title: FK YOUR GAME, FK YOUR SYSTEM
body: FK EVERYTHING THAT HAS TO DO WITH YOU LEAGUE. YOU GARBAGGE ASSS SHIT. GIVING SOME FLAMING ASS PEOPLE AND BAN ME FOR GETTING BACK AT THEM IN TWO SENTENCES. FUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUCK YOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUUU

replies.body:
Well, if your in-game chat is anything like your post. I would say that you must deserve what came to you.

Of course, that is, unless you want to provide your chat logs to prove your innocence.

Quoted verbatim from the Riot Support article "Instant Feedback System FAQ":

> WHY WAS I PUNISHED WHEN THE OTHER PERSON WAS WORSE OR STARTED IT!
* Simply speaking, retaliation is not an acceptable or justifiable behavior. An argument between two players can easily create a negative experience for the rest of the players in the game with you. Regardless of the other player’s actions, this does not justify your own behavior. You alone are responsible for your actions within the game. If you encounter a toxic player like this, the best option is to simply report their behavior and move on.
* Reports are a vital piece to the puzzle. If you are not sure of what sort of behavior is reportable take a look at the Reporting a Player FAQ

Game 1
In-Game

RIP TSM: you give free objectives lmao
RIP TSM: all of you muted, dont waste your time
RIP TSM: fuck you
RIP TSM: Report lux pls

RIP TSM: i find it funny, they flaming me, but shes lux "Adc"
RIP TSM: and ive died once in 22 mins lmao

RIP TSM: youre jsut feeding
RIP TSM: gold on me is good

RIP TSM: look at scoreboard
RIP TSM: seems i wont be able to carry this, gg fellas
RIP TSM: whenver i have great games, i get the bad team, feelsbad
RIP TSM: nice flash
RIP TSM: youve been worthless all game
RIP TSM: its not like im lying
RIP TSM: he spawsn to die, idk if youve noticed
RIP TSM: gg bad team
RIP TSM: thank you

RIP TSM: for toxicity
RIP TSM: yeah
RIP TSM: bc you didnt have the most farm
RIP TSM: look at mines
RIP TSM: i got no honors
RIP TSM: feels good


My jg and "Adc" started running it down mid with his duo Rammus "support" In other words, bullshit. OH, btw, the reason we lasted long in that game was actually because I was ahead on gold since i had the most gold out of both teams, with the most items. I do report these players, but Riot seems to like me too much and decides to snipe me. Ima just uninstall this game and let it keep dying. Time to go to Fortnite bois

You were banned because of the 9 previous penalties you've had, and the fact that you just got off a 14-day ban mere days ago. You were warned during that time that not changing your behavior would result in this.

Why you give such titlting ppl. How do you expect to keep calm when someone is legit harrasing you in game. Makes no sense. Why do you give me afks. Why do i still see these kind of ppl in my games. Uninstalled it is. I honestly feel ashamed now of having played this game so long and actually spent money on it since at one point I was enjoying it

You are literally that person. Why do games have toxic people in them? Because you, yourself, are toxic. You cant be upset about everyone else being toxic when you are, and be surprised toxicity exists in LoL.
LOL ok, Cuz I'd be toxic when im telling you what to do to win the game when you decided to troll, I think youd be perfect to work for riot with that mindset
Nah i wouldnt be a good fit for riot. Id just instantly ban you and remove you from the boards to not deal with you anymore. Riot has more respect for everyone than i have fucks to give.
hahaha, i doubt that. all bark no bite, is your kind of person
No, i used to do some moderation for a small private server. I did my fair share of making people dissappear.

> [{quoted}](name=RIP TSM,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-18T19:02:17.227+0000)
>
> Why you give such titlting ppl. How do you expect to keep calm when someone is legit harrasing you in game. Makes no sense. Why do you give me afks. Why do i still see these kind of ppl in my games. Uninstalled it is. I honestly feel ashamed now of having played this game so long and actually spent money on it since at one point I was enjoying it

You should be ashamed of your attitude. 

The game can't make you react anyway, that is all you. Own it, reflect, learn from your mistakes, and grow up.
If someone smacks the hell outta your face, I guess you'd sit down in cry instead of getting a hit back. I critic myself. SO your argument is invalid. I have come to understand how the game works

> [{quoted}](name=RIP TSM,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=000000000000000000030000,timestamp=2018-05-18T19:37:49.094+0000)
>
> If someone smacks the hell outta your face, I guess you'd sit down in cry instead of getting a hit back. I critic myself. SO your argument is invalid. I have come to understand how the game works

You analogy doesn't make sense and doesn't apply to your situation (you are in zero physical danger) nor to my response.

You don't have to engage in game chat and you have the ability to mute all. While it's true you can't prevent a bad player from being on your team you can remove potential triggers by not chatting with anyone. 

If you're unable to control yourself and your actions,the problem lies with you.

You need communication on game, so muting at times can be bad. More than half of you probably think that being told what to do to win the game is flaming. If thats the case, your opinion is still invalid. Look for a better one

> [{quoted}](name=RIP TSM,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=00000000000000000003000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-18T20:45:11.433+0000)
>
> You need communication on game, so muting at times can be bad. More than half of you probably think that being told what to do to win the game is flaming. If thats the case, your opinion is still invalid. Look for a better one

You can communicate via pings and you have already proved your inability to communicate. Your ban underscores  your inability to be civil.
how can you see pings when you mute them ? what

> [{quoted}](name=RIP TSM,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=0000000000000000000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-18T21:35:34.674+0000)
>
> how can you see pings when you mute them ? what

Lol, I mute all chat. I do not typically mute pings. Unless some toxic jerk on my team begins to spam them.
That is what OP said originally so your are invalid.

> [{quoted}](name=Tÿr,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=000000000000000000030000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-22T00:47:22.031+0000)
>
> That is what OP said originally so your are invalid.

 _I_ ,  the actual human am not invalid. Because, that _is_ what you actually typed. 

However, let me address what you think you implied by your eloquently typed reply:

 "...so your are invalid." I can ignore the obvious syntax issues because we all make them. 

I think you meant that my response is invalid. If that's the case, no it's not. 


**My Premise**
1. The mute all option exists, is a true statement


2. OP could use mute all during the game to drastically reduce the opportunity to be toxic, is also true (notice, I didn't say 100%. 

My conclusion is that  by  using the mute all option the opportunity of being toxic during the game is drastically reduced. And because the conclusion follows from my premise therfore it _**is valid**_. 

Be aware that just because my argument is valid doesn't necessarily mean it's true, just that it's well formed. 


And it's still valid even if you disagree and it's fine if you do disagree, but my argument is not dependent on agreement. 

Example of an invalid deductive argument

All unmarried men are bachelors. 
Jim is a married man. 
Therefore Jim is a bachelor. 

This is a simple invalid argument, because the conclusion doesn't follow from the
If someone's toxic, they're not gonna say anything useful anyways so you lose nothing by muting.

Yea, if someone is trying to hit me and all I have to do is to press a button and an invisible barrier appears to protect me from all harm, of course I would just sit down and chill.

No need to cry about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Bello Bagheera,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=00000000000000000003,timestamp=2018-05-18T19:28:14.300+0000)
>
> You should be ashamed of your attitude. 
> 
> The game can't make you react anyway, that is all you. Own it, reflect, learn from your mistakes, and grow up.

Yes when the game is buggy as hell and is so unbalanced you want to shoot yourself.

I swear half the time a riot mod or whatever is in my games purposely trolling me.

You act like Riot knows everyone's behavior and decides who to put you in a game with. People are unpredictable. For example, I do not constantly trash talk my team mates in-game no matter how frustrated or angry I get, but what is stopping me from playing on any given day and deciding that I was tired of being nice and proceeded to start flaming and trash talking my team to oblivion.

There is no surefire way to prevent toxic players from playing with the players who don't do anything wrong.
5 games, 3 afks, 2 games where my bot lane rane it down mid. IDK, seems too "coincidental"

Let's theory craft. Riot posted on here and said you had nine other accounts of being a negative nancy in game. How much should I bet you caused those things to happen with your disruptive and combative nature you're displaying in these comments?

Riot makes an effort to remove such toxic players from the game.

ie, you. 

Now nobody else has to be matched with you.
They shoulda done better and get rid of the other ones too
If they try to remove themselves from the community as hard as you did it's just a matter of time
Oh, they taking too long. They still wanna make some money so they need some players to stay. And they cant make money off from Challenger players only
Where do you get the tinfoil for your hat?
do you even know how this game works business wise ?
All I know is that the part you mentioned is shit business practice and wouldn't work and if they did this, there wouldn't be a League of Legends to complain about.

> [{quoted}](name=Tÿr,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=000000000000000000020001,timestamp=2018-05-22T00:48:32.575+0000)

Except if you go into the player behavior boards and look around you'll see 10's upon 10's of people complaining about their permanent bans, chat restrictions and etc. So yes, really.

> [{quoted}](name=Thee Pie Man,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=0000000000000000000200010000,timestamp=2018-05-22T01:37:07.656+0000)
>
> Except if you go into the player behavior boards and look around you'll see 10's upon 10's of people complaining about their permanent bans, chat restrictions and etc. So yes, really.

10s upon 10s out of 100s of thousands or millions of players?  {{champion:48}}

> [{quoted}](name=Tÿr,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=00000000000000000002000100000000,timestamp=2018-05-22T02:04:29.164+0000)
>
> 10s upon 10s out of 100s of thousands or millions of players?  {{champion:48}}

I don't think millions of players are toxic, I don't even think hundreds of thousands of players are toxic. I think there's a small minority that is injected into most games (Most being an operative word for the games being called into action in most of these conversations), and others just have off games and get flamed for it causing behaviors that accelerate out of control personally. Don't really understand why you're nitpicking, not EVERYONE who's banned posts on the forums, or even that gets punished, only the people that feel they were not rightfully so, there's no precedence for how many people actually do get punished or not and until I see such a number that proves your analysis of the situation correct we can only work off the information we have available. Which is that players DO get banned. How many people in total frequent the forums out of the hundreds of thousands of players of League? Do you feel like that is an accurate number of people in comparison to how many people actually play it? 

If so then you can do the math from there and figure out how many it would equal out to based on both sample sizes. It doesn't take much, just time, and if you want to take that time go ahead. I've got better things to do than provide someone who's hellbent on blaming people for something that frankly is a bigger problem than they are making it out to be.
{{summoner:11}}

> [{quoted}](name=Riot Tantram,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=mlNXI7ZY,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-05-18T18:57:23.684+0000)
>
> You were banned because of the 9 previous penalties you've had, and the fact that you just got off a 14-day ban mere days ago. You were warned during that time that not changing your behavior would result in this.

But you guys still choose to ignore the real problem and what causes people to get mad. Try punishing the people that actually ruin matches for once there bucko. Who knows you might actually see toxic behavior decrease.

Mute is for chat, but unfortunately you guys give no option to deal with trolls. Try getting rid off the people that actually have toxic game play, not the low hanging easy fruit people tjat just use words.

i'm quite tired but i still wanna ask this. i typed in this and got banned for it and i have been couple hours on reddit and i discovered that riot has a zero tolerence policy for that kind of behavior and i didnt know this and well my point is that i meant it only as an insult(Doesnt make it sound any better)
 Game 1
Ha1kuu: IM BACK BABY(bad connection fixed so i was exited)
Ha1kuu: sry i was afk(felt bad for my team mates so i apologised)
Ha1kuu: kys ezreal kys(made a mistake and notices ezreals unmeta 2 tear of the goddess build and felt a little care free and agitated so i desided to insult him)
Ha1kuu: wtf have they done to quin(quin 1vs3 my team)

(from a reddit discussion i followed and this great mans answer explained what i meant and i plan on not using those kinds of words again since i dont want to be banned)

And what praytell were you meaning when you said that to ezreal? Because it sure wasnt kiss kiss.

He means he didn't mean it exactly as it sounds, you know how sometimes words become popular in culture and we use them in the wrong context?

Like when was the last time you texted your friend "lmao" and you legitimately laughed your butt off :/

It can be meant without the venom, as a way of calling someone an idiot (bad example), but I've seen people say worse things than that and as long as they don't use too many trigger words, it not a problem for them.

so i hoped that MAYBE my penalty could be decreased since 2 weeks is a long time and ill do anything to lower it
i guess, ima just let the game die
You do that.
keep dreaming lol
I dont dream, i hustle
So... You dream.

my name was a predition LOL, TSM got smacked on this first split, but its ok, theyll come back

I would have to say that I am seeing a little more than two sentences of retaliation here.

Also, you say that you are leaving this "dying" game to go play Fortnite.

Fortnite, the game that already has had its peak and will be irrelevant within a year and a half just like H1Z1 and PUBG.
